name: digital-media
title: DigitalMedia
description: Media (sound, image, video, text) in a digital manifestation.

fields.name: digitalMediaID
fields.description: The unique identifier for an instance of DigitalMedia.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: digitalMediaType
fields.description: The category that best matches the nature of the DigitalMedia.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: eventID
fields.description: A unique identifier for the Event captured in the DigitalMedia instance.

fields.name: accessURI
fields.description: A URI that uniquely identifies a service that provides a representation of the DigitalMedia.

fields.name: WebStatement
fields.description: A URL defining or further elaborating on the license statement (e.g., a web page explaining the precise terms of use).

fields.name: format
fields.description: A string describing the technical format (file format or physical medium) of the DigitalMedia.

fields.name: license
fields.description: The license or waiver under which the DigitalMedia is shared.

fields.name: rights
fields.description: The rights reserved with respect to the DigitalMedia.

fields.name: rightsURI
fields.description: The URI to the statement about the rights reserved with respect to the DigitalMedia.

fields.name: accessRights
fields.description: The statement of rights with respect to access to the DigitalMedia.

fields.name: Owner
fields.description: The Agent who holds the rights over the DigitalMedia.

fields.name: source
fields.description: A string providing an identifiable source from which the DigitalMedia was derived.

fields.name: sourceURI
fields.description: A URI providing an identifiable source from which the DigitalMedia was derived.

fields.name: creator
fields.description: The Agent responsible for the creation of the DigitalMedia.

fields.name: created
fields.description: The date on which the DigitalMedia was created.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The date on which the DigitalMedia was most recently modified.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The ISO639-2 three-letter language code (if any) in which the content of the DigitalMedia is recorded.

fields.name: bibliographicCitation
fields.description: The preferred citation for the DigitalMedia.
